recipesJson.name: Stwarbmelon
recipesJson.author: MrJwp08
recipesJson.description:
In my opinion, the perfect summer vape. Wonderful full frontal Watermelon essence, with the Strawberry, only just, poking its head through. Give it a try, and don't forget to let me know what you think :):)

Added text for Midweek Critique--

So this is one of my older recipes, created at least 3/4 years ago. But, for me, it still stands up as one of my top fruit vapes, so I thought, lets see how Wayne critiques it!!

Both the TPA Strawberry and Strawberry Ripe form the background body of the flavour. I really wanted to focus on the Watermelons.

Cap HoneyDew Melon @ 4% coupled with the INW and TPA Watermelons made the melon shine through in  the recipe. 

FA Raspberry added some consistency on the exhale. It gives that edge when it comes to adding some authenticity to the flavor.

Added just a touch of INW Dragon fruit to enhance the juiciness of the vape.

I originally had Cap Marshmallow, but removed it as it just seemed to mute the fruits.

Vaped and tested on Entheon RDA Fused Clapton Coils @0.73ohms 45W
